arts.ttl: Bayer Leverkusen snatch dramatic draw as Club Brugge demolish Monaco in Champions League
arts.sum: Leverkusen needed an injury-time goal to draw 2-2 with FC Copenhagen while Club Brugge beat Monaco 5-1 and Kairat Almaty lost heir first-ever Champions League group-stage match to Sporting CP

arts.ttl: Club Brugge hit Monaco for four in Champions League rout
arts.sum: Club Brugge get their 2025-26 Champions League campaign off to a perfect start as they run riot with a 4-1 win against Monaco at the Jan Breydelstadion.

arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS | Club Brugge 4-1 Monaco: Humbling defeat for Monégasques in Flanders
arts.sum: The build-up to this season’s Champions League opener has hardly been ideal for Monaco. After their flight to Bruges was delayed until Thursday morning due to an air conditioning problem…

arts.ttl: Excitement grows: Belgian media preview Club Brugge’s Champions League clash with AS Monaco
arts.sum: Club Brugge and AS Monaco get their respective UCL campaigns off and underway tonight, as they face off at the Jan Dreydel Stadion.

arts.ttl: Monaco predicted XI v Club Brugge: Denis Zakaria and Mohammed Salisu add to list of absentees
arts.sum: AS Monaco head to Belgium on Thursday a little depleted. Denis Zakaria is the latest to succumb to injury as they prepare to open their UEFA Champions League campaign against…

Club Brugge's preparation for the first group stage game of the new Champions League campaign has been less than ideal, with the hosts looking to avenge a 1-0 away defeat to RAAL La Louviere on Saturd...
